entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
